trans-unit.source: Represents one or more <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> objects.
A Toolset is a combination of a Toolset version (such as "2.0"), a tools path, and an optional set of associated properties.

<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection> allows you to retrieve individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset> objects by passing the string value of the tools version corresponding with the desired <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset>.
Adds the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> to this collection.
<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection.Add%2A> replaces any previous value that has the same tools version.
It also notifies the parent <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine> of the change.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> object representing the Toolset to add to the collection.
This method is not supported.
Gets whether the collection contains a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref> name.
Required.
A string value representing the name of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> is contained in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets whether the collection contains a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> with the specified tools version.
Required.
A string value representing the tools version associated with the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> is contained in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.

Copies the contents of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in Array at which copying begins.
Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref>.
Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset> element in the collection represents a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset> in the project.
An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> objects in the collection.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref>.
Gets whether the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref> is read-only.
<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection.IsReadOnly"></xref> always returns `false` because Toolsets are always writable.
<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> always returns `false` because Toolsets are always writable.
A boolean value indicating whether the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ToolsetCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Gets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> associated with the specified tools version.
Required.
A string value representing the tools version associated with the desired <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref>.
A object representing the toolset that matches the specified toolsVersion.
This method is not supported.
Not supported.
Not supported.
Gets the names of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref>s stored in this collection.
An enumeration whose elements represent individual <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Toolset"></xref> objects in this collection.
Non-generic enumerator for the Toolsets in this collection.
Returns the enumerator.
Returns an enumerator for the toolsets.
